articles.title: We got iOS 14 early! Hands-on with all the new features - CNET
articles.description: Apple announced iOS 14 at the WWDC keynote. I tried out the developer beta version to get an early look at what's coming to our iPhones in the fall.
articles.content:
iOS 14 brings a number of refinements large and small to iPhones, including the ability to pin widgets to your home screen and have picture-in-picture video.
Patrick Holland/CNET
